meanings.definition: A substance added to a material to make it more flexible or easier to shape.
meanings.sent1: The plasticizer helped the clay become more bendable.
meanings.sent2: The manufacturer added a plasticizer to the rubber to make it softer.
meanings.sent3: The plasticizer whispered to the stiff plastic, 'Let's dance!'
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was the plasticizer that molded her dreams into reality.
meanings.sent5: The magic plasticizer turned the hard material into a flexible masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound that is used to increase the flexibility or workability of a material.
meanings.sent1: The plasticizer in the paint made it easier to spread.
meanings.sent2: The scientist mixed the plasticizer into the resin to make it more pliable.
meanings.sent3: The plasticizer joked with the rigid substance, 'Why so stiff?'
meanings.sent4: His determination acted as a plasticizer, smoothing out the rough edges of the project.
meanings.sent5: With a touch of plasticizer, the tough material transformed into a flexible wonder.
